properties.name: application.audience
properties.description: The 'aud' claim in Auth0's JWTs. Confirms that the token was issued for the caller.

properties.name: application.client-origin-url
properties.description: Allowed CORS origin used by the client.

properties.name: application.protected-endpoints
properties.description: List of API endpoints requiring authentication.

properties.name: application.scheduling.enabled
properties.description: Whether scheduled tasks should run. Defaults to TRUE when missing.

properties.name: application.scheduling.poll-building-queue
properties.description: Interval at which the DB is polled for recently finished buildings.
